idea:
Boozno.com, a #VenueTech platform, is building the most extensive modern-day technology to organise the venue booking industry in India. It will save time and money and provide a hassle-free experience in booking various kinds of venues for personal or business needs. 


Our focus is not just B2C but B2B by backing the venues by providing seamless Booking Management Software to help them manage user journey from leads to bookings and much more.
name: BOOZNO TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: WiseFlow Technologies builds mission-focused AI products for the defense and security of India. We build AI enabled autonomous navigation software for unmanned systems such as Quadcopters, Fixed Wing Drones, Hybrid Drones and Unmanned Ground Vehicles. Our ground breaking AI enables features such as Target Lock and Track, Homing-in in GPS Denied Environment and Obstacle Avoidance.
name: WISE FLOW TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
SK SPARKLING SNAGGERS dream is to provide the concept of ‘LOCK AND KEY’ where we provide Acid wash, Deep Cleaning,

Snagging and Handover of flat- all under one roof which will help the builder deliver a quality home to the

Customer within prescribed timelines. At a later stage, we can expand this business further to provide

Housekeeping services to society and Small Township along with maintenance and management services

The process involves Acid wash, Deep Cleaning,

Snagging, General cleaning and Key Handover.

To ensure complete customer satisfaction & avoid

any issues, the builder avoids the handover of defective

or unclean flats. And hence they outsource the Deep

Cleaning and Snagging Services.
name: SK SPARKLING SNAGGERS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are building online education platform. On our platform students will receive live sessions from industry professionals.
name: MeNerd

idea: We are a new Travel Company based in Mumbai. We launched the company in Mumbai in February 2020 and offer holiday packages, hotel reservation, ticketing (air, rail, bus), private and group tours, cruise and affordable package tours worldwide
name: World On Board Travel & Tourism LLP

idea: JetPricer is a smart repricer that helps ecommerce retailers win buyboxes on Amazon, Walmart and eBay, which helps them get more orders and increase profits while selling
name: JetPricer
